description:
We love rocket-tier laptops, but sometimes all you need is a reliable machine to get your work done on a daily basis. You know, a laptop with a decent configuration that doesn’t cost an arm and a leg.

That’s why this daily driver Dell Inspiron 15 is a superb choice for just $430 at Dell.com (down from its $550 MSRP). Right now you can save $120 on this 15.6-inch laptop that’s great for work, school, or simple browsing. Worth it at full price, but even better on sale.

Featuring an Intel Core i5 processor and a solid 16GB of DDR4 RAM, this laptop can easily handle any task you throw its way. While it may not have a dedicated graphics card, the integrated Intel Iris Xe delivers crisp visuals, good enough for light gaming
title: Save $120 on this lightweight Dell Inspiron 15 laptop right now
